Now you can edit your teams.
Added search bar in the hero select modals.
Added new Malicus's Consciousness maps made by Moriyaism. Zone 1, 2, 3.
Switch buff and debuff (dead) icons from EpicSevenDB to CDN.
Added Malicus's Consciousness map by Moriyaism. Updated Raid Nightamre and Nixied 2 and Nixied 3 maps.
"Locked Heroes Only" filter is back after it went missing during the transition from Camp Simulator v1 to v2. While "Locked Heroes Only" is active other filters will be ignored.
Added Nightmare raid map made by reddit user SJack2.
SC Heroes and their normal version in the same team.
Setting role/attribute to a negative value will no longer trigger advanced settings calculation.
Fixed old roster URLs not being parsed correctly.
New code, easier to edit and add new features. Also now it's easier to translate, contact me if you are interested in helping translate.
Shorter Export URLs. When generating URLs to transfer/share your roster the length of the URL has been reduced, URLs generated with the old Camp Simulator are still compatible.

When saving a team you can change the team formation by clicking the characters and moving them in the 4 slots.
Now you can also provide a description to help future you.

Popular teams and characters page has been updated.
Now you can sort the results and filter by a specific unit.
If you see a team you like you can click it and you can save it in your teams.
unfortunately I had to reset the old stats because the data was unreliable and too hard to work with.
The old data can be viewed at the bottom of the stats page.
Overall UI improvments for better mobile support.
Fixed an issue that in the old camping simulator caused the "Team size exceeded" error while "Locked heroes count towards the fulfillment of the selected advanced settings" and 4 heroes where locked.
Help messages. Help windows will be back sometime in the future.
